textBeforeTable: Social Security offices near Bloomingdale, IL : Social Security Office Tips (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Ads Social Security offices have seen their hours reduced the past few years. Almost all Social Security offices are open 9:00 to 4:00, except for 9:00 to noon on Wednesdays. Call to see if you can get an appointment by phone first. Fridays may have more appointments available. Try doing things online like applying for disability benefits at ssa.gov. Bloomingdale Social Security Office Notes 230 W LAKE STREET IS ON THE SOUTH SIDE OF LAKE ST BETWEEN BLOOMINGDALE/ ROSELLE RD TO THE EAST AND SPRINGFIELD DR TO THE WEST. A BANK AND TUTOR TIME DAY CARE ARE IN THE SAME OFFICE PARK. WE ARE DIRECTLY ACROSS THE STREET FROM SALERNO FUNERAL HOME AND NEXT TO PLATT HILL NURSERY. THE NORTH SIDE OF LAKE ST IS ROSELLE, THE SOUTH SIDE OF THE STREET IS BLOOMINGDALE SO THE WELCOME TO ROSELLE SIGN AND THE NUMBERING ADDRESSES MAY BE CONFUSING.
